description: Not only view, but print, sign, and annotate PDFs with the free Adobe Acrobat Reader DC.
notes: This manifest only uninstalls Adobe Acrobat Reader. To install run 'scoop install AdobeAcrobatReader-Install -global'

script: $id = wmic product where """name like '$msiprogramname%'""" get IdentifyingNumber | find /i """-"""
